name: Snow Union I
lore:
&7Place this minion and it will start
&7generating and shoveling snow!
&7Requires an open area to place
&7snow. Minions also work when you are
&7offline!

&7&8''However, it seems like this minion is''
&8''on strike.''

&7Time Between Actions: &a&lFOREVER!&r
&7Max Storage: &e64
&7Resources Generated: &b0

&7Obtained from the &dA Honk and Seek
&dAdventure &7event during April Fools.

&c&lSPECIAL&r
